location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter announces that Brigadier General John Malcolm has arrived at Bushire. The Resident is also forwarding a cover letter from Jaffer Ali Khan [Ja‘afar ‘Alī Khān] with a French letter he has received (neither of which are present).
